Module com.example.mydmsproject
Package com.example.mydmsproject.model

Class Brick

java.lang.Object
com.example.mydmsproject.model.Sprite
com.example.mydmsproject.model.Brick
public class Brick extends Sprite
A Sprite class implements the main game element Brick, store Crack objects.
Author:
Tianxiang Song - modified

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Brick(int type, int positionX, int positionY)
    Default class constructor, set type, score and position of this brick, assign Buff/BonusBall to it with specific probability and Crack with specific type.
